content.sql:
--删除临时表 IF object_id('tempdb..#TEMP_TABLE') IS NOT NULL BEGIN DROP TABLE #TEMP_TABLE END;
WITH base AS ( SELECT ms.CORP_ID AS corpId, banner.ITEM_NAME AS corpName, ms.TYPE_ID AS channelId, channel.ITEM_NAME AS channelName, mp.BRAND_ID AS brandId, brand.ITEM_NAME AS brandName, mp.PROD_CODE AS prodCode, mp.PROD_ALIAS AS prodName, mp.SORT AS P_SORT
,sum(CASE WHEN substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),DATEADD(dd,0,dds.BILL_DATE),23),0,8) = substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dateadd(mm,-12,'$Year$'+'-09-01' ),23),0,8) THEN dds.box ELSE 0 END ) AS LY_9 ,sum(CASE WHEN substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),DATEADD(dd,0,dds.BILL_DATE),23),0,8) = substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dateadd(mm,0, '$Year$'+'-09-01'),23),0,8) THEN dds.box ELSE 0 END ) AS TY_9
,sum(CASE WHEN substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),DATEADD(dd,0,dds.BILL_DATE),23),0,8) = substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dateadd(mm,-11,'$Year$'+'-09-01'),23),0,8) THEN dds.box ELSE 0 END ) AS LY_10 ,sum(CASE WHEN substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),DATEADD(dd,0,dds.BILL_DATE),23),0,8) = substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dateadd(mm,1,'$Year$'+'-09-01'),23),0,8) THEN dds.box ELSE 0 END ) AS TY_10
,sum(CASE WHEN substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),DATEADD(dd,0,dds.BILL_DATE),23),0,8) = substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dateadd(mm,-10,'$Year$'+'-09-01' ),23),0,8) THEN dds.box ELSE 0 END ) AS LY_11 ,sum(CASE WHEN substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),DATEADD(dd,0,dds.BILL_DATE),23),0,8) = substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dateadd(mm,2,'$Year$'+'-09-01' ),23),0,8) THEN dds.box ELSE 0 END ) AS TY_11
,sum(CASE WHEN substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),DATEADD(dd,0,dds.BILL_DATE),23),0,8) = substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dateadd(mm,-9,'$Year$'+'-09-01' ),23),0,8) THEN dds.box ELSE 0 END ) AS LY_12 ,sum(CASE WHEN substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),DATEADD(dd,0,dds.BILL_DATE),23),0,8) = substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dateadd(mm,3,'$Year$'+'-09-01' ),23),0,8) THEN dds.box ELSE 0 END ) AS TY_12
,sum(CASE WHEN substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),DATEADD(dd,0,dds.BILL_DATE),23),0,8) = substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dateadd(mm,-8,'$Year$'+'-09-01' ),23),0,8) THEN dds.box ELSE 0 END ) AS LY_1 ,sum(CASE WHEN substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),DATEADD(dd,0,dds.BILL_DATE),23),0,8) = substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dateadd(mm,4,'$Year$'+'-09-01' ),23),0,8) THEN dds.box ELSE 0 END ) AS TY_1
,sum(CASE WHEN substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),DATEADD(dd,0,dds.BILL_DATE),23),0,8) = substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dateadd(mm,-7,'$Year$'+'-09-01' ),23),0,8) THEN dds.box ELSE 0 END ) AS LY_2 ,sum(CASE WHEN substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),DATEADD(dd,0,dds.BILL_DATE),23),0,8) = substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dateadd(mm,5,'$Year$'+'-09-01' ),23),0,8) THEN dds.box ELSE 0 END ) AS TY_2
,sum(CASE WHEN substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),DATEADD(dd,0,dds.BILL_DATE),23),0,8) = substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dateadd(mm,-6,'$Year$'+'-09-01' ),23),0,8) THEN dds.box ELSE 0 END ) AS LY_3 ,sum(CASE WHEN substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),DATEADD(dd,0,dds.BILL_DATE),23),0,8) = substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dateadd(mm,6,'$Year$'+'-09-01' ),23),0,8) THEN dds.box ELSE 0 END ) AS TY_3
,sum(CASE WHEN substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),DATEADD(dd,0,dds.BILL_DATE),23),0,8) = substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dateadd(mm,-5,'$Year$'+'-09-01' ),23),0,8) THEN dds.box ELSE 0 END ) AS LY_4 ,sum(CASE WHEN substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),DATEADD(dd,0,dds.BILL_DATE),23),0,8) = substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dateadd(mm,7,'$Year$'+'-09-01' ),23),0,8) THEN dds.box ELSE 0 END ) AS TY_4
,sum(CASE WHEN substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),DATEADD(dd,0,dds.BILL_DATE),23),0,8) = substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dateadd(mm,-4,'$Year$'+'-09-01' ),23),0,8) THEN dds.box ELSE 0 END ) AS LY_5 ,sum(CASE WHEN substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),DATEADD(dd,0,dds.BILL_DATE),23),0,8) = substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dateadd(mm,8,'$Year$'+'-09-01' ),23),0,8) THEN dds.box ELSE 0 END ) AS TY_5
,sum(CASE WHEN substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),DATEADD(dd,0,dds.BILL_DATE),23),0,8) = substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dateadd(mm,-3,'$Year$'+'-09-01' ),23),0,8) THEN dds.box ELSE 0 END ) AS LY_6 ,sum(CASE WHEN substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),DATEADD(dd,0,dds.BILL_DATE),23),0,8) = substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dateadd(mm,9,'$Year$'+'-09-01' ),23),0,8) THEN dds.box ELSE 0 END ) AS TY_6
,sum(CASE WHEN substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),DATEADD(dd,0,dds.BILL_DATE),23),0,8) = substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dateadd(mm,-2,'$Year$'+'-09-01' ),23),0,8) THEN dds.box ELSE 0 END ) AS LY_7 ,sum(CASE WHEN substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),DATEADD(dd,0,dds.BILL_DATE),23),0,8) = substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dateadd(mm,10,'$Year$'+'-09-01' ),23),0,8) THEN dds.box ELSE 0 END ) AS TY_7
,sum(CASE WHEN substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),DATEADD(dd,0,dds.BILL_DATE),23),0,8) = substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dateadd(mm,-1,'$Year$'+'-09-01' ),23),0,8) THEN dds.box ELSE 0 END ) AS LY_8 ,sum(CASE WHEN substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),DATEADD(dd,0,dds.BILL_DATE),23),0,8) = substring(convert(VARCHAR(100),dateadd(mm,11,'$Year$'+'-09-01' ),23),0,8) THEN dds.box ELSE 0 END ) AS TY_8
FROM RPT_DATA_SALE dds --关联产品 INNER JOIN MDM_PRODUCT mp ON mp.PROD_CODE=dds.TARGET_PROD_CODE LEFT JOIN BASE_DICT_ITEM AS brand ON mp.BRAND_ID=brand.DICT_ITEM_ID AND brand.DICT_ID='prodBrand' --关联门店 INNER JOIN MDM_STORE AS ms ON ms.STORE_CODE=dds.TARGET_STORE_CODE LEFT JOIN BASE_DICT_ITEM AS banner ON ms.CORP_ID=banner.DICT_ITEM_ID AND banner.DICT_ID='storeCorp' LEFT JOIN BASE_DICT_ITEM AS channel ON ms.TYPE_ID=channel.DICT_ITEM_ID AND channel.DICT_ID='storeType'
LEFT JOIN DMS_CLIENT dc ON dds.CLIENT_ID=dc.CLIENT_ID LEFT JOIN MDM_DISTRIBUTOR md ON md.DIST_ID=dc.DIST_ID LEFT JOIN BASE_ORG bo ON bo.ORG_ID=md.ORG_ID
WHERE dds.BILL_DATE >= convert(VARCHAR,dateadd(mm,-12,'$Year$'+'-09-01 00:00:00'),120) and dds.BILL_DATE <= convert(VARCHAR,dateadd(mm,12,'$Year$'+'-08-31 23:59:59'),120) AND ms.CORP_ID IS NOT NULL AND ms.TYPE_ID IS NOT NULL AND mp.BRAND_ID IS NOT NULL $orgId$ $distId$ $bannerId$ $channelId$ $brandId$ $simsOrgId$ and mp.PROD_CODE not in ('zengpin','qita','tingchan')
GROUP BY ms.CORP_ID, banner.ITEM_NAME, ms.TYPE_ID, channel.ITEM_NAME, mp.BRAND_ID, brand.ITEM_NAME, mp.PROD_CODE, mp.PROD_ALIAS, mp.SORT )
SELECT * INTO #TEMP_TABLE FROM base
--明细 SELECT channelName, corpName, brandName, prodName ,CAST(sum(LY_9) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY_9, CAST(sum(TY_9) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY_9 ,CASE WHEN sum(TY_9) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_9) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_9) - sum(LY_9))/sum(LY_9)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r1 ,CAST(sum(LY_10) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY_10, CAST(sum(TY_10) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY_10 ,CASE WHEN sum(TY_10) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_10) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_10) - sum(LY_10))/sum(LY_10)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r2 ,CAST(sum(LY_11) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY_11, CAST(sum(TY_11) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY_11 ,CASE WHEN sum(TY_11) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_11) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_11) - sum(LY_11))/sum(LY_11)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r3 ,CAST(sum(LY_12) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY_12, CAST(sum(TY_12) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY_12 ,CASE WHEN sum(TY_12) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_12) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_12) - sum(LY_12))/sum(LY_12)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r4 ,CAST(sum(LY_1) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY_1, CAST(sum(TY_1) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY_1 ,CASE WHEN sum(TY_1) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_1) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_1) - sum(LY_1))/sum(LY_1)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r5 ,CAST(sum(LY_2) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY_2, CAST(sum(TY_2) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY_2 ,CASE WHEN sum(TY_2) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_2) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_2) - sum(LY_2))/sum(LY_2)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r6 ,CAST(sum(LY_3) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY_3, CAST(sum(TY_3) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY_3 ,CASE WHEN sum(TY_3) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_3) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_3) - sum(LY_3))/sum(LY_3)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r7 ,CAST(sum(LY_4) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY_4, CAST(sum(TY_4) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY_4 ,CASE WHEN sum(TY_4) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_4) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_4) - sum(LY_4))/sum(LY_4)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r8 ,CAST(sum(LY_5) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY_5, CAST(sum(TY_5) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY_5 ,CASE WHEN sum(TY_5) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_5) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_5) - sum(LY_5))/sum(LY_5)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r9 ,CAST(sum(LY_6) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY_6, CAST(sum(TY_6) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY_6 ,CASE WHEN sum(TY_6) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_6) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_6) - sum(LY_6))/sum(LY_6)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r10 ,CAST(sum(LY_7) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY_7, CAST(sum(TY_7) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY_7 ,CASE WHEN sum(TY_7) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_7) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_7) - sum(LY_7))/sum(LY_7)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r11 ,CAST(sum(LY_8) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY_8, CAST(sum(TY_8) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY_8 ,CASE WHEN sum(TY_8) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_8) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_8) - sum(LY_8))/sum(LY_8)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r12
,CAST(sum(LY_9 + LY_10 + LY_11 + LY_12 + LY_1 + LY_2 + LY_3 + LY_4 + LY_5 + LY_6 + LY_7 + LY_8) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY ,CAST(sum(TY_9 + TY_10 + TY_11 + TY_12 + TY_1 + TY_2 + TY_3 + TY_4 + TY_5 + TY_6 + TY_7 + TY_8) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY
,CASE WHEN sum(TY_9 + TY_10 + TY_11 + TY_12 + TY_1 + TY_2 + TY_3 + TY_4 + TY_5 + TY_6 + TY_7 + TY_8) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_9 + LY_10 + LY_11 + LY_12 + LY_1 + LY_2 + LY_3 + LY_4 + LY_5 + LY_6 + LY_7 + LY_8) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_9 + TY_10 + TY_11 + TY_12 + TY_1 + TY_2 + TY_3 + TY_4 + TY_5 + TY_6 + TY_7 + TY_8) - sum(LY_9 + LY_10 + LY_11 + LY_12 + LY_1 + LY_2 + LY_3 + LY_4 + LY_5 + LY_6 + LY_7 + LY_8))/ sum(LY_9 + LY_10 + LY_11 + LY_12 + LY_1 + LY_2 + LY_3 + LY_4 + LY_5 + LY_6 + LY_7 + LY_8)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r12
,CASE WHEN sum(TY_9 + TY_10 + TY_11 + TY_12 + TY_1 + TY_2 + TY_3 + TY_4 + TY_5 + TY_6 + TY_7 + TY_8) =0 THEN '0%' ELSE CASE WHEN (SELECT sum(TY_9 + TY_10 + TY_11 + TY_12 + TY_1 + TY_2 + TY_3 + TY_4 + TY_5 + TY_6 + TY_7 + TY_8) FROM #TEMP_TABLE) =0 THEN '100%' ELSE cast(cast(sum(TY_9 + TY_10 + TY_11 + TY_12 + TY_1 + TY_2 + TY_3 + TY_4 + TY_5 + TY_6 + TY_7 + TY_8)/(SELECT sum(TY_9 + TY_10 + TY_11 + TY_12 + TY_1 + TY_2 + TY_3 + TY_4 + TY_5 + TY_6 + TY_7 + TY_8) FROM #TEMP_TABLE)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r14 FROM #TEMP_TABLE GROUP BY channelName, corpName, brandName, prodName
UNION ALL
--渠道合计 SELECT channelName, '', '', '' ,CAST(sum(LY_9) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY_9, CAST(sum(TY_9) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY_9 ,CASE WHEN sum(TY_9) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_9) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_9) - sum(LY_9))/sum(LY_9)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r1 ,CAST(sum(LY_10) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY_10, CAST(sum(TY_10) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY_10 ,CASE WHEN sum(TY_10) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_10) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_10) - sum(LY_10))/sum(LY_10)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r2 ,CAST(sum(LY_11) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY_11, CAST(sum(TY_11) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY_11 ,CASE WHEN sum(TY_11) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_11) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_11) - sum(LY_11))/sum(LY_11)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r3 ,CAST(sum(LY_12) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY_12, CAST(sum(TY_12) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY_12 ,CASE WHEN sum(TY_12) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_12) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_12) - sum(LY_12))/sum(LY_12)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r4 ,CAST(sum(LY_1) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY_1, CAST(sum(TY_1) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY_1 ,CASE WHEN sum(TY_1) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_1) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_1) - sum(LY_1))/sum(LY_1)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r5 ,CAST(sum(LY_2) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY_2, CAST(sum(TY_2) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY_2 ,CASE WHEN sum(TY_2) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_2) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_2) - sum(LY_2))/sum(LY_2)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r6 ,CAST(sum(LY_3) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY_3, CAST(sum(TY_3) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY_3 ,CASE WHEN sum(TY_3) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_3) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_3) - sum(LY_3))/sum(LY_3)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r7 ,CAST(sum(LY_4) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY_4, CAST(sum(TY_4) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY_4 ,CASE WHEN sum(TY_4) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_4) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_4) - sum(LY_4))/sum(LY_4)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r8 ,CAST(sum(LY_5) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY_5, CAST(sum(TY_5) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY_5 ,CASE WHEN sum(TY_5) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_5) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_5) - sum(LY_5))/sum(LY_5)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r9 ,CAST(sum(LY_6) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY_6, CAST(sum(TY_6) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY_6 ,CASE WHEN sum(TY_6) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_6) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_6) - sum(LY_6))/sum(LY_6)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r10 ,CAST(sum(LY_7) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY_7, CAST(sum(TY_7) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY_7 ,CASE WHEN sum(TY_7) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_7) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_7) - sum(LY_7))/sum(LY_7)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r11 ,CAST(sum(LY_8) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY_8, CAST(sum(TY_8) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY_8 ,CASE WHEN sum(TY_8) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_8) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_8) - sum(LY_8))/sum(LY_8)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r12
,CAST(sum(LY_9 + LY_10 + LY_11 + LY_12 + LY_1 + LY_2 + LY_3 + LY_4 + LY_5 + LY_6 + LY_7 + LY_8) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY ,CAST(sum(TY_9 + TY_10 + TY_11 + TY_12 + TY_1 + TY_2 + TY_3 + TY_4 + TY_5 + TY_6 + TY_7 + TY_8) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY
,CASE WHEN sum(TY_9 + TY_10 + TY_11 + TY_12 + TY_1 + TY_2 + TY_3 + TY_4 + TY_5 + TY_6 + TY_7 + TY_8) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_9 + LY_10 + LY_11 + LY_12 + LY_1 + LY_2 + LY_3 + LY_4 + LY_5 + LY_6 + LY_7 + LY_8) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_9 + TY_10 + TY_11 + TY_12 + TY_1 + TY_2 + TY_3 + TY_4 + TY_5 + TY_6 + TY_7 + TY_8) - sum(LY_9 + LY_10 + LY_11 + LY_12 + LY_1 + LY_2 + LY_3 + LY_4 + LY_5 + LY_6 + LY_7 + LY_8))/ sum(LY_9 + LY_10 + LY_11 + LY_12 + LY_1 + LY_2 + LY_3 + LY_4 + LY_5 + LY_6 + LY_7 + LY_8)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r12
,CASE WHEN sum(TY_9 + TY_10 + TY_11 + TY_12 + TY_1 + TY_2 + TY_3 + TY_4 + TY_5 + TY_6 + TY_7 + TY_8) =0 THEN '0%' ELSE CASE WHEN (SELECT sum(TY_9 + TY_10 + TY_11 + TY_12 + TY_1 + TY_2 + TY_3 + TY_4 + TY_5 + TY_6 + TY_7 + TY_8) FROM #TEMP_TABLE) =0 THEN '100%' ELSE cast(cast(sum(TY_9 + TY_10 + TY_11 + TY_12 + TY_1 + TY_2 + TY_3 + TY_4 + TY_5 + TY_6 + TY_7 + TY_8)/(SELECT sum(TY_9 + TY_10 + TY_11 + TY_12 + TY_1 + TY_2 + TY_3 + TY_4 + TY_5 + TY_6 + TY_7 + TY_8) FROM #TEMP_TABLE)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r14 FROM #TEMP_TABLE GROUP BY channelName
UNION ALL
--门店组织合计 SELECT '', corpName, '', '' ,CAST(sum(LY_9) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY_9, CAST(sum(TY_9) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY_9 ,CASE WHEN sum(TY_9) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_9) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_9) - sum(LY_9))/sum(LY_9)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r1 ,CAST(sum(LY_10) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY_10, CAST(sum(TY_10) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY_10 ,CASE WHEN sum(TY_10) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_10) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_10) - sum(LY_10))/sum(LY_10)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r2 ,CAST(sum(LY_11) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY_11, CAST(sum(TY_11) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY_11 ,CASE WHEN sum(TY_11) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_11) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_11) - sum(LY_11))/sum(LY_11)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r3 ,CAST(sum(LY_12) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY_12, CAST(sum(TY_12) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY_12 ,CASE WHEN sum(TY_12) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_12) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_12) - sum(LY_12))/sum(LY_12)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r4 ,CAST(sum(LY_1) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY_1, CAST(sum(TY_1) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY_1 ,CASE WHEN sum(TY_1) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_1) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_1) - sum(LY_1))/sum(LY_1)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r5 ,CAST(sum(LY_2) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY_2, CAST(sum(TY_2) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY_2 ,CASE WHEN sum(TY_2) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_2) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_2) - sum(LY_2))/sum(LY_2)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r6 ,CAST(sum(LY_3) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY_3, CAST(sum(TY_3) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY_3 ,CASE WHEN sum(TY_3) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_3) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_3) - sum(LY_3))/sum(LY_3)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r7 ,CAST(sum(LY_4) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY_4, CAST(sum(TY_4) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY_4 ,CASE WHEN sum(TY_4) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_4) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_4) - ,CAST(sum(LY_9 + LY_10 + LY_11 + LY_12 + LY_1 + LY_2 + LY_3 + LY_4 + LY_5 + LY_6 + LY_7 + LY_8) AS decimal(38,2)) as LY ,CAST(sum(TY_9 + TY_10 + TY_11 + TY_12 + TY_1 + TY_2 + TY_3 + TY_4 + TY_5 + TY_6 + TY_7 + TY_8) AS decimal(38,2)) as TY
,CASE WHEN sum(TY_9 + TY_10 + TY_11 + TY_12 + TY_1 + TY_2 + TY_3 + TY_4 + TY_5 + TY_6 + TY_7 + TY_8) =0 THEN '-' ELSE CASE WHEN sum(LY_9 + LY_10 + LY_11 + LY_12 + LY_1 + LY_2 + LY_3 + LY_4 + LY_5 + LY_6 + LY_7 + LY_8) =0 THEN 'NEW' ELSE cast(cast((sum(TY_9 + TY_10 + TY_11 + TY_12 + TY_1 + TY_2 + TY_3 + TY_4 + TY_5 + TY_6 + TY_7 + TY_8) - sum(LY_9 + LY_10 + LY_11 + LY_12 + LY_1 + LY_2 + LY_3 + LY_4 + LY_5 + LY_6 + LY_7 + LY_8))/ sum(LY_9 + LY_10 + LY_11 + LY_12 + LY_1 + LY_2 + LY_3 + LY_4 + LY_5 + LY_6 + LY_7 + LY_8)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r12
,CASE WHEN sum(TY_9 + TY_10 + TY_11 + TY_12 + TY_1 + TY_2 + TY_3 + TY_4 + TY_5 + TY_6 + TY_7 + TY_8) =0 THEN '0%' ELSE CASE WHEN (SELECT sum(TY_9 + TY_10 + TY_11 + TY_12 + TY_1 + TY_2 + TY_3 + TY_4 + TY_5 + TY_6 + TY_7 + TY_8) FROM #TEMP_TABLE) =0 THEN '100%' ELSE cast(cast(sum(TY_9 + TY_10 + TY_11 + TY_12 + TY_1 + TY_2 + TY_3 + TY_4 + TY_5 + TY_6 + TY_7 + TY_8)/(SELECT sum(TY_9 + TY_10 + TY_11 + TY_12 + TY_1 + TY_2 + TY_3 + TY_4 + TY_5 + TY_6 + TY_7 + TY_8) FROM #TEMP_TABLE)*100 AS decimal(38,0) )AS VARCHAR)+'%' END END as r14 FROM #TEMP_TABLE GROUP BY corpName
